Name: Lord
Description: Owner of some small portion of Plainland. Easily recognizable by the clean clothes and the lack of body odor. Due to their status, they prefer to stay back and support the troops.

Attacks.Attack Description: Gives the surrounding troops a boost in health and magic defense. It's effects come more from the white magic the Lord is using than their raw charisma, but they don't like it when you say that to them.
